name: 陳映竹
objective: 本課程目的旨在提供一般初學者對環境工程有一個廣泛的認識，課程內容多以概論性述說為主，包括給水工程、污水工程、空氣污染防制、固體廢棄物處理、噪音振動控制、土壤污染及復原技術、環境影響評估及地球環境問題等幾個單元，冀望藉由簡單明淺的講授，激發對研究環境工程的興趣，進而達到環境保護之目的。
schedule:
1)Introduction
2)Science and the environment(1/2)
3)Science and the environment(2/2)
4)Water: hydrologic cycle and human use (1/2)
5)Water: hydrologic cycle and human use (2/2)
6)The production and distribution of food
7)Energy from fossil fuels (1/2)
8)Energy from fossil fuels (1/2)
9)Mid-term exam
10)Renewable energy (1/2)
11)Renewable energy (2/2)
12)Global climate change
13)Atmospheric pollution
14)Water pollution and its prevention (1/2)
15)Water pollution and its prevention (2/2)
16)Municipal solid waste: disposal and recovery
17)Sustainable communities and lifestyles
18)Final exam
scorePolicy:
Grading will be broken down into the following categories：
1)Participation/homework(30%)
2)Mid-term exam(30%)
3)Final exam(45%)
materials: Wright, R.T., Boorse, D.F., 2014. Environmental Science Toward a Sustainable Future. Pearson New International Edition (歐亞書局代理)
